author: LinOnetwo
description: Record your life issues, medication usage, and the process of recovery, in TiddlyWiki

{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/buff":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/buff","description":"Good things that added to your body or health, like "Regular exercise", "Cyborg legs", "laser myopia surgery" or "encouraged by friends"","text":"$:/tags/HealthTracker/Buff"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/condition":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/condition","description":"Normal conditions like "blood pressure" or "weight"","text":"$:/tags/HealthTracker/Condition"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/debuff":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/debuff","description":"bad things like "flu", "hair loss", "broken leg", etc.","text":"$:/tags/HealthTracker/DeBuff"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/Config/defaultFields-DebuffDynamicTable":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/Config/defaultFields-DebuffDynamicTable","text":"tbl-expand caption startDate"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/medicine":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/medicine","description":"Drugs you are taking, related to one of your buff/debuff/condition.","text":"$:/tags/HealthTracker/Medicine"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/EditTemplate/TitleStyle.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/EditTemplate/TitleStyle.css","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"div[data-tags~="$:/tags/HealthTracker/DeBuff"] input.tc-titlebar.tc-edit-texteditor:nth-of-type(1), div[data-tags~="$:/tags/HealthTracker/Buff"] input.tc-titlebar.tc-edit-texteditor:nth-of-type(1) { font-size: unset; }"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/UnderBuffDebuffCondition":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/UnderBuffDebuffCondition","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"<$list filter="[all[current]tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/debuff}] [all[current]tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/buff}] [all[current]tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/condition}]"> <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> endDate=<> opmi_medicalConditionStatus="resolvedCondition" /> {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Set Ended}} {{||$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/EditTime}} "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/EditTemplate/caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/EditTemplate/caption","tags":"$:/tags/EditTemplate","list-after":"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/title","code-body":"yes","text":"<$list filter="[all[current]tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/debuff}] [all[current]tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/buff}]"> <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="caption" focus="yes" class="tc-titlebar tc-edit-texteditor"/> "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/Sidebar":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/Sidebar","tags":"$:/tags/SideBar","caption":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Health Tracker}}","text":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/HomePage}}"},"$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status":{"created":"20230219143648537","text":"OPMI is a biomedical ontology in the area of precision medicine and its related investigations. It is community-driven and developed by following the OBO Foundry ontology development principles. In OPMI, we treated medical condition status as a status, which is a realizable entitry. One major section of the branch is various diagnosis condition status. There are basically two types of diagnosis: one type diagnosis is treated as a condition status, the other is diagnosis (OGMS_0000073) as a type of clinical data item. One good example to illustrate the difference is the difference between primary and principal diagnoses. While these can be (and frequently are) the same diagnosis in practice, their definitions are distinct. While a principal diagnosis is the underlying cause of patient symptoms, the primary diagnosis is used for healthcare billing purposes and is a type of medical condition status. Reference: https://www.definitivehc.com/resources/glossary/primary-diagnosis","title":"$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status","tags":"$:/SuperTag/TraitTag","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","modified":"20230219145213110","url":"https://oscaf.sourceforge.net/tmo.html#tmo:Task","schema":"{ "type": "object", "properties": { "opmi_medicalConditionStatus": { "type": "string", "description": "The state or status at the point during the visit the diagnosis was given (admitting diagnosis, final diagnosis), whether the diagnosis was determined due to laboratory findings, if the diagnosis was exclusionary, or if it was a preliminary diagnosis, among others.", "default": "confirmedDiagnosis", "enum": [ "admissionDiagnosis", "causeOfDeath", "conditionToBeDiagnosedByProcedure", "confirmedDiagnosis", "contributoryCauseOfDeath", "deathDiagnosis", "dischargeDiagnosis", "postoperativeDiagnosis", "preliminaryDiagnosis", "preoperativeDiagnosis", "primaryDiagnosis", "referralDiagnosis", "resolvedCondition", "secondaryDiagnosis" ] } } }","wl-field-name-text":"schema"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/caption","code-body":"yes","text":"<>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/captionCascade":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/captionCascade","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplateTitleFilter","list-before":"$:/config/ViewTemplateTitleFilters/system","text":"[tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/debuff}then[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/caption]] [tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/buff}then[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/caption]]"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/AddNewItem":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/AddNewItem","text":"
{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Add New Item}} <$button> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> startDate=<> tags={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/debuff}} opmi_medicalConditionStatus="confirmedDiagnosis" caption={{$:/language/DefaultNewTiddlerTitle}} /> DeBuff <$button> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> startDate=<> tags={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/buff}} opmi_medicalConditionStatus="confirmedDiagnosis" caption={{$:/language/DefaultNewTiddlerTitle}} /> Buff <$button> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" startDate=<> tags={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/condition}} opmi_medicalConditionStatus="confirmedDiagnosis" /> {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Body Condition}} <$button> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" tags={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/medicine}} /> {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Medicine}}
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/DebuffDynamicTable":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/DebuffDynamicTable","text":"\import [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/filters/health]] \define caption() Debuff <$count filter=<> /> <$macrocall $name=table-dynamic caption=<> filter=<> fields={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/Config/defaultFields-DebuffDynamicTable}} class="w-100" state="health-buff-debuff-tracker-DebuffDynamicTable-state" />"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/EditTime":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/EditTime","text":"

"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/filters/health":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/filters/health","text":"\define filter-is-active() [has[opmi_medicalConditionStatus]!field:opmi_medicalConditionStatus[resolvedCondition]] \define get-all-debuff() [all[tiddlers]tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/debuff}filter]"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/About Buff Debuff":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/About Buff Debuff","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> 这是一个用于表明条目记录了症状或健康情况的标签。 你可以通过给任意条目添加 [[$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status]] 标签来制作你自己的[ext[超级标签|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag/]]。 <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> You can make your own [ext[SuperTag|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag/]] by adding [[$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status]] tags to any tiddler. "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Add New Item":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Add New Item","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> 添加新项目 <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> Add New Item "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Body Condition":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Body Condition","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> 身体状态 <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> Body Condition "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Data Fields":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Data Fields","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> 数据字段 <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> Data Fields "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Health Record Summary":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Health Record Summary","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> !! 健康记录摘要 <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> !! filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> 在太微中记录你的生活问题、用药情况和康复过程 <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> Record your life issues, medication usage, and the process of recovery, in TiddlyWiki "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Set Ended":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Set Ended "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/HomePage":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/HomePage","text":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/AddNewItem}} {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/i18n/Health Record Summary}} {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/DebuffDynamicTable}}"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/MedicationLogging":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/MedicationLogging"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/RecoveryLogging":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/RecoveryLogging"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/SymptomLogging":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/SymptomLogging"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> !! 健康 Buff 和 Debuff 追踪器 本健康状况记录应用程序旨在为用户提供一个简单方便的工具，用于记录各种健康问题、药物使用情况和恢复过程，满足日益增长的个人健康监测需求。 用户数据将以本地优先的方式保存，以保护隐私，界面也将非常友好，未来还可能增加数据分析功能，以进一步提高用户对自身健康状况的了解。 <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> !! Health Buff & Debuff Tracker This Health Status Recording App aims to provide a simple and convenient tool for users to document various health issues, medication usage, and the process of recovery, addressing the growing demand for personal health monitoring. User data will be saved in the local-first way for privacy, the interface will be user-friendly, and potential future additions include data analysis features to further enhance users' understanding of their health conditions. "},"$:/tags/HealthTracker/Buff":{"title":"$:/tags/HealthTracker/Buff","tags":"$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status"},"$:/tags/HealthTracker/Condition":{"title":"$:/tags/HealthTracker/Condition","tags":"$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status"},"$:/tags/HealthTracker/DeBuff":{"title":"$:/tags/HealthTracker/DeBuff","tags":"$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status"},"$:/tags/HealthTracker/Medicine":{"title":"$:/tags/HealthTracker/Medicine"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tree":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tree","creator":"LinOnetwo","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<>"}}}
